type.description: Machine that runs middleware, on which scripts can be executed, and so on.

property.name: os
property.label: Operating System
property.description: Operating system of the host.

property.name: temporaryDirectoryPath
property.description: Directory in which temporary files are stored. This directory will be cleaned up when the connection is closed.

property.name: jumpstation
property.description: Jumpstation that should be used to reach this host.

property.name: connectionOptions
property.description: Additional connection options passed to the Overthere connection. See the Overthere documentation for a complete list of available options.

property.name: protocol
property.description: Protocol to use when connecting to this host.

type.description: Machine that can be connected to using SSH.

property.name: connectionType
property.description: Type of SSH connection to create.

property.name: address
property.description: Address of the host.

property.name: port
property.description: Port on which the SSH server runs.

property.name: username
property.description: Username to connect with.

property.name: password
property.description: Password to use for authentication.

property.name: privateKeyFile
property.description: Private key file to use for authentication.

property.name: passphrase

property.name: sudoUsername
property.label: SUDO username
property.description: Username to sudo to when accessing files or executing commands.

property.name: suUsername
property.label: SU username
property.description: Username to su to when accessing files or executing commands.

property.name: suPassword

type.description: Machine that can be connected to using either WinRM or Telnet and can perform file manipulation via the CIFS protocol.

property.name: os
property.label: Operating System
property.description: Operating system of the host.

property.name: connectionType
property.description: Type of CIFS connection to create.

property.name: address
property.description: Address of the host.

property.name: port
property.description: Port on which the Telnet or WinRM server runs.

property.name: username
property.description: Username to connect with.

property.name: password
property.description: Password to use for authentication.

property.name: cifsPort
property.label: CIFS Port
property.description: Port on which the CIFS server runs.

property.name: pathShareMappings
property.label: Windows path to Windows share mappings
property.description: Mapping from Windows paths to Windows share names; for example, C:\IBM\WebSphere -> WebSphereShare.

property.name: winrmEnableHttps
property.label: Enable HTTPS for WinRM
property.description: Enable SSL communication to the WinRM server.

property.name: winrsAllowDelegate
property.label: Allow credential delegation
property.description: Specifies that the user's credentials can be used to access a remote share; for example, one found on a different machine than the target endpoint (WINRM_NATIVE only).

property.name: winrsProxy
property.description: Host on which to run the winrs command (WINRM_NATIVE only). Defaults to localhost.

property.name: temporaryDirectoryPath
property.description: The default platform value (/tmp) suffices as no temporary files will be placed on the jumpstation.
